com.gej.core

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.gej.core.ResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    A resource manager to load the resources in separate thread. Can load images and sounds and say the load percentage. Get the resources from the manager and assign them in the update() method of the Game class like this. 
     
 Image myImg = null;
 WavSound mySound = null;
 
 public void initResources(){
     ResourceManager.defineImage("resources/myImg.png");
     ResourceManager.defineSound("resources/mySound.wav");
     ResourceManager.loadResources();
 }
 
 public void update(long elapsedTime){
     switch (getState()){
         case GAME_LOADING:
              // Loading completed
              if (!ResourceManager.isLoading()){
                  // Get the loaded image
                  myImg = ResourceManager.getImage("resources/myImg.png");
                  // Get the loaded sounded
                  mySound = ResourceManager.getSound("resources/mySound.wav");
                  // Change game state
                  setState(GameState.GAME_PLAYING);
              }
              break;
         case GAME_PLAYING:
              .....
     }
 }
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati
